description: This template deploys a lab environment for the Mastering PKI course. This includes four Windows and (optionally) one Linux VMs. There's a AD DC, a stand-alone root CA, an Enterprise CA, and a workstation. The optional Linux has OpenSSL and nginx.
summary: This template deploys a lab environment for the Mastering PKI course. This includes a number of Windows and (optionally) Linux VMs.
